S04bsu003_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharatisma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśarbhibhikṣuśataiḥ sambahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
S04bsu003_u:2_0: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśrīyāṃ kumārabhūtām āmantrayate sma /
S04bsu003_u:2_1: asti mañjuśrīrūpariṣṭāyām aparimitāguṇasañcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu003_u:3_0: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtā, ime jambudvipakā manuṣyā alpāyuṣkā varṣaśatāyuṣas,
S04bsu003_u:3_2: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātram api śroṣyanti yāvat pustakagatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiśca samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjāyiṣyanti te parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ punaraiva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:3_3: ye khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścita tejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S04bsu003_u:3_4: teṣām āyurvadhayiṣyanti, ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣām apyāyurvivardhayiṣyati /
S04bsu003_u:4_0: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrīdirghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmaḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti teṣām ime guṇānusaṃsā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:5_0: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,
S04bsu003_u:5_1: tadyathā, om puṇyamahāpuṇya aparimitāpuṇya aparimitāyupuṇya jñānasambhāropacite,
S04bsu003_u:5_2: om sarvasaṃskāra pariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayāparivāre svāhā /
S04bsu003_u:6_0: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecil likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S04bsu003_u:7_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:8_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:9_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:10_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:11_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:12_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:13_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣaṭtriṃśatīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:14_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:15_0: om namo bhagavate / tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam /
S04bsu003_u:16_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācinnarakeṣūpapadyate na tīryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācid api upapasyate /
S04bsu003_u:16_2: tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:17_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:18_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:19_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu003_u:20_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:20_1: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣa na rākṣasā nākālamṛtyurevatāraṃ lapsyante /
S04bsu003_u:21_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:21_1: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ sammukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyanti,
S04bsu003_u:21_4: nātra kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā /
S04bsu003_u:22_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:22_1: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:23_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate /
S04bsu003_u:24_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:24_2: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣīnāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau abhisambodhim abhisambhotsyante /
S04bsu003_u:25_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācid api bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu003_u:26_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpaṇaṃ dānaṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu003_u:26_1: tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu003_u:27_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam dharmabhāṇakaṃ pūjayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:28_0: om namo bhagavate / yathā vipaśviśikhiviśvabhukrakucchandakanakamunikāśyapaśākyamuniprabhṛtīnāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayaḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ,
S04bsu003_u:28_1: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu003_u:29_0: om namo bhagavate / yathā sumeroḥ parvatarājasya samānāṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt,
S04bsu003_u:29_2: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu003_u:30_0: om namo bhagavate / yathā catvāro mahāsamudrā udakaparipūṇṇā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu003_u:30_2: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu003_u:31_0: om namo bhagavate / ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti /

S04bsu003_u:38_0: om namo bhagavate / idam vocadbhagavān āttamanaste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanam iti /
